word: Now, Brother Olsen, find some one else for Nebraska and let Elder Loughborough stand in his right place, as a Caleb, coming to the front and bearing a decided testimony in the face of unbelief and doubts and skepticism. We are well able to go up and possess the goodly land. God said of him, "My servant Caleb. . . hath followed me fully, him will I bring into the land." [Numbers 14:24.] Calebs are most needed in the churches today.
